content.prompt: In context, the description of the little girls’ fairy-tale play in lines 41-47 serves to

choices.label: exemplify a belief in endless possibilities that the speaker finds appealing
offer hope that the speaker will one day find a resolution to her despair
provide the speaker with a distraction from the reality of her imminent death
symbolize the speaker’s own emotional collapse in response to life’s hardships

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
